## Three portfolios for a renewable NEM
::: {.fragment .fade-in-then-semi-out}
Best wind and solar portfolio.

- Best = maximise (average output/variability of output) 
:::
::: {.fragment .fade-in-then-semi-out}
Lowest cost portfolio

 - Much more solar and gas
::: 
::: {.fragment .fade-in-then-semi-out}
ITK's preferred portfolio, 

- minimises gas (ie carbon), 
- cost is still low, Sharpe ratio high
